attributes.action: ban fireworks, allow organised displays only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: every year fireworks cause more fear and annoyance than they are worth, they are extremely intimidating, loud, annoying and dangerous. by doing so, we will stop thugs on our streets buying them for targeting the public and animals just for kicks. i think most would agree that organised events are the safest way if people want to celebrate the gunpowder plot.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
